html:
11.26.22  4:55 pm   do you use reference pictures to construct your 3d environments

     yes

     or do you only use your memory and imagination?

     sometimes

11.26.22  4:54 pm   Are you going to start making more short videos like how to pull a rabbit out a hat

      maybe

11.26.22  4:52 pm   is the rabbit evil?

      i'm not sure

11.26.22  4:49 pm   Why does your latest video sound like your videos before "here comes the sun"?

      possibly because it was written in march of 2018

11.26.22  4:49 pm   is there something inside of every box

      no

11.26.22  4:44 pm   do you reckon there are hidden sounds and music humans cant hear, kinda like how snakes see more colour than us?

      yes. anything above 20khz is probably inaudible to just about any person

11.26.22  4:39 pm   how do i get over shame?

      go for a walk

11.26.22  4:36 pm   was the "rabbit" video you released 3 days after "perfect" intentional?

     yes

     or did you actually make it in 3 days??

     more like 2

11.26.22  4:33 pm   can you make up a random name?

      no. anything made up by a person will be genuine to that person in some way

11.26.22  4:22 pm   how do i pull myself out of a barren wasteland?

      how about doing a double lift

11.26.22  4:22 pm   should i ask a question?

      no need to decide now

11.26.22  4:05 pm   a few questions regarding your most recent upload, "how to pull a rabbit out of a hat". why would the rabbit leave their habitat? are they scared? is it no longer suitable?

      a hat is not a good rabbit habitat (rabbitat). that was satire

11.26.22  3:54 pm   Does this actually work?

      we'll see

11.26.22  3:39 pm   does using comic sans for the rabbit mean that you're going to start using more fonts in the 3d videos?

      i already started using more fonts, in the previous video. i'd love to start making my own fonts if possible

11.26.22  3:36 pm   do you hear colors ?

      no

11.26.22  3:33 pm   i like your new video about rabbits, hats, etc. will you consider pulling other animals out of hats, or rabbits out of other objects

      all in due time

11.26.22  3:29 pm   Have you modeled the entire world your 3d animation "Perfect." plays in yourself? Like all the cars and trees and buildings, the sky and so on?

      yes

11.26.22  3:28 pm   is pulling a rabbit out of a hat really about the friends we make along the way

      yes it is. i couldn't have said it better myself

11.26.22  3:25 pm   Should I consider making a hat my new habitat even though I am not a rabbit? 

      no. not very spacious

11.26.22  3:23 pm   your voice sounds calm - seems like it would be good in a podcast setting....would you ever make a podcast?

      sure, if i can be mercilessly selective in which takes i use for each phrase of the podcast

11.26.22  3:21 pm   How do I be cool

      teach someone else how to do it

11.26.22  3:20 pm   how DO i pull myself out of a barren waste land?

      sleight of hand

11.26.22  3:19 pm   wait, when on earth did you make "how to pull a rabbit out of a hat"?

      yesterday and today

11.26.22  2:59 pm   Since the guy from "how to pull a rabbit out of a hat" has a phone,

     i don't think that phone belongs to the person. i think it spontaneously appeared in the hat

     and the phone has a ringtone, what would the name of that ringtone be?

     'rabbit'

11.26.22  2:57 pm   Did the person in "how to pull a rabbit out of a hat" ever get out of that h- barren waste land?

      yes

11.26.22  12:12 pm   are the two friends on the beach actually friends?

      maybe more

11.26.22  10:44 am   opinions on camels

      some camels have 2 humps, while some humps have 2 camels

11.26.22  8:06 am   hi bill, how r u so good at the things u do? 

      could be some kind of defense mechanism

11.26.22  6:40 am   why is it that when people say that the weather is good they mean that it's sunny?

      it probably means they like sunny weather

11.26.22  5:32 am   is note near the door to corner store a reference to "express myself to the world"-part from music video 'you're free to do whatever you want to'

      no

11.26.22  5:17 am   Why are the license plates on all the cars in Perfect noise?

      this was plan B. i actually wanted to put registration numbers on all the cars. but i absolutely did not want any of them to have the same number. so i was assuming that it would be a somewhat elaborate project to set that up. of similar nature to the other things i had to do with the cars, making them, getting them on the road, getting the different kinds to appear more/less often, setting up the rules for which colors appear how often, etc. But the time and days were dragging on and i was running behind schedule so i thought of the alternate idea of putting animated noise on all the plates. Actually i think i like that idea better for this video, because these cars are not exactly behaving like cars that were individually registered

11.26.22  2:51 am   Do you have a college degree?

      never heard of it

11.26.22  2:50 am   how do i stop an existential crisis

      have a second one

11.26.22  2:47 am   has a question you received here ever completely ruined your life?

      temporarily

11.26.22  12:26 am   Opinion on land boats?

      fake

11.25.22  11:57 pm   do you think that people have pretended to be looking for a previous question that they asked, just so they can be in that one chain of questions

     yes, but they don't get added to the chain if they are pretending. i can tell

      (which is a great gag btw)

11.25.22  11:18 pm   do you like playing board games?

      i was going to say yes, but now that i think about it no

11.25.22  10:46 pm   did you write "Perfect" on location?

      virtually, yes

11.25.22  10:26 pm   Is cheese corny?
Is corn cheesy?

      with hard work and due diligence, yes

11.25.22  9:24 pm   Do you ever get a little carried away sometimes?

      yes

11.25.22  7:29 pm   Thoughts on thoughts?

      it's another world, in your mind!

11.25.22  7:00 pm   can you add more lobster section lore

      it might be better left to the imagination

11.25.22  5:27 pm   Are you sincere? I feel sincere when I watch and listen to your stuff, so I think you must be, too?

      generally, yes

11.25.22  5:04 pm   once a year, i mess up my haircut, just to keep myself from getting too comfy, do you do anything like this? throw yourself any strange challenges, or get in your own way, purposefully?

     yes

11.25.22  4:48 pm   Do you write out your instrumental music before playing, or do you just improvise and keep what sounds good?

      some of both

11.25.22  4:43 pm   what is your most favorite project you've done?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.25.22  4:32 pm   Whats your favourite song that you made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.25.22  3:04 pm   are your dreams as weird as everyone else's or are they less weird because they cancel out with your net weirdness? 

      put it this way, i recently had a dream which, long story short, ended up with a small electronic device which was speaking, repeatedly, the phrase "hire hire a trigger hire. hire hire a trigger hire."

11.25.22  1:57 pm   what's the purpose of a question?

      to find out more

11.25.22  1:16 pm   how good do you think you are at conveying sarcasm?

     the best sarcasm is unconveyed

     how good do you think we think you are at conveying sarcasm?

     medium

     how good are you actually at, at conveying sarcasm?

     medium
